bibl.title: Imported Hellenistic Stamped Amphora Handles.
bibl.note: 17 Rhodian stamped amphora handles. 1 Koan, 1 Knidian (?), 3 Latin.
ARIEL Donald T., Imported Hellenistic Stamped Amphora Handles.

S.C. HERBERT and A. BERLIN, with contributions by D.T. ARIEL, T.V. BUTTREY, E. FRIEDLAND, M. LAWALL, R.W. REDDING, and H.T.WRIGHT, Excavations at Coptos (Qift) in Upper Egypt, 1987-1992. Kelsey Museum of the University of Michigan - University of Assiut = Journal of Roman Archaeology. Supplementary Series. 53 = Kelsey Museum Fieldwork Series (Portsmouth, Rhode Island, 2003) pp. 193-200, 22 figg.
